title: Best of The Program | Guests: Aubrey Shines & Paul Kengor | 9/10/20
description:
If we lose our freedom in the era of Big Tech, there may be no coming back. The Left’s plan to destroy the Western way of life is coming to fruition. People are appalled by the Netflix show “Cuties,” but the things that are now entering our schools’ sex-ed programs are even worse and pure evil. Bishop Aubrey Shines, chairman of the Conservative Clergy of Color, joins to discuss a message from black pastors to Nike: Stop the “anti-Christian” Black Lives Matter campaign. “The Devil and Karl Marx” author Paul Kengor discusses how Marx’s deep affinity for Satan helped form the principles of communism that are still brewing today.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
